sense.name: conference
sense.commentary: CONSULTATION[+event] audience, interview a conference between two or more people
sense.examples: He had a consultation with the judge. He requested a consultation with the king. Frequent consultations with his lawyer became very expensive. A consultation of several medical specialists was needed.

sense.name: consulting
sense.commentary: CONSULTATION[+event] the act of referring or consulting
sense.examples: The consultation to an encyclopedia produced the answer.
